name: Vileplume
author: chibi
flavor_text: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

abilities.name: Disgusting Pollen
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Basic Pokémon can’t attack.

attacks.name: Downer Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
